metadata.translation_strategy: Professional Dutch business language, not literal translations

priority_1_critical.description: Core workshop functionality that must be Dutch for professional use

priority_2_important.description: Module content that significantly impacts user experience

subtitle.english: Discovering What We Can Achieve Together
subtitle.suggested_dutch: Ontdekken Wat We Samen Kunnen Bereiken

excellence_goal.english: In the first 15 minutes, demonstrate that extraordinary solutions are within our collective reach. Create excitement about the possibilities we can unlock together.
excellence_goal.suggested_dutch: In de eerste 15 minuten, demonstreer dat buitengewone oplossingen binnen ons collectief bereik liggen. Creëer opwinding over de mogelijkheden die we samen kunnen ontgrendelen.

capability_celebration_text.english: Live demonstration showing how context-engineered AI transforms from generic responses to organization-specific excellence. Watch capability multiply before our eyes.
capability_celebration_text.suggested_dutch: Live demonstratie die laat zien hoe context-geëngineered AI transformeert van generieke antwoorden naar organisatie-specifieke excellentie. Zie bekwaamheid vermenigvuldigen voor onze ogen.

empowerment_text.english: Show the dramatic difference between generic AI and expertly-contextualized solutions. The gap between these two represents the untapped potential in this room.
empowerment_text.suggested_dutch: Toon het dramatische verschil tussen generieke AI en vakkundig gecontextualiseerde oplossingen. De kloof tussen deze twee vertegenwoordigt het onbenutte potentieel in deze ruimte.

healthcare.english: Healthcare: Transform error codes into clear, actionable guidance
healthcare.suggested_dutch: Zorgverlening: Transformeer foutcodes in duidelijke, uitvoerbare begeleiding

finance.english: Finance: Convert transaction data into strategic insights
finance.suggested_dutch: Finance: Converteer transactiedata naar strategische inzichten

operations.english: Operations: Turn process documentation into intelligent automation
operations.suggested_dutch: Operations: Zet procesdocumentatie om in intelligente automatisering

hr.english: HR: Create personalized employee support systems

achievement_text.english: has unlocked the power to build AI-enhanced solutions that transform organizational capability
achievement_text.suggested_dutch: de kracht heeft ontgrendeld om AI-versterkte oplossingen te bouwen die organisatorische bekwaamheid transformeren

tagline.english: From consumer to creator in 3.5 hours
tagline.suggested_dutch: Van consument naar creator in 3,5 uur

notes_placeholder.english: Document the energy shift when participants see the transformation, note questions and excitement levels...
notes_placeholder.suggested_dutch: Documenteer de energieverschuiving wanneer deelnemers de transformatie zien, noteer vragen en opwindingsniveaus...

collaboration_philosophy.english: Every department brings unique perspectives that, when combined thoughtfully, create solutions no single group could achieve alone. This exercise reveals collaboration opportunities and builds mutual understanding.
collaboration_philosophy.suggested_dutch: Elke afdeling brengt unieke perspectieven die, wanneer doordacht gecombineerd, oplossingen creëren die geen enkele groep alleen zou kunnen bereiken. Deze oefening onthult samenwerkingsmogelijkheden en bouwt wederzijds begrip op.

physical_positioning.english: Participants physically position themselves along two spectrums to reveal the diversity of experience and motivation in the room.
physical_positioning.suggested_dutch: Deelnemers positioneren zich fysiek langs twee spectrums om de diversiteit van ervaring en motivatie in de ruimte te onthullen.

daily_builder.english: I build and configure technology daily
daily_builder.suggested_dutch: Ik bouw en configureer dagelijks technologie

seamless_user.english: I prefer technology that works seamlessly without my attention
seamless_user.suggested_dutch: Ik verkies technologie die naadloos werkt zonder mijn aandacht

position_finding.english: Everyone else finds their authentic position between these endpoints
position_finding.suggested_dutch: Iedereen vindt zijn authentieke positie tussen deze eindpunten

capability_expansion.english: I'm here because I want to expand my capabilities
capability_expansion.suggested_dutch: Ik ben hier omdat ik mijn capaciteiten wil uitbreiden

role_recommendation.english: I'm here because it was recommended for my role
role_recommendation.suggested_dutch: Ik ben hier omdat het aanbevolen werd voor mijn rol

intersection_description.english: The intersection of these two spectrums creates four distinct collaboration styles, each contributing essential perspectives to excellence-driven solution development.
intersection_description.suggested_dutch: De kruising van deze twee spectrums creëert vier verschillende samenwerkingsstijlen, elk draagt essentiële perspectieven bij aan excellence-gedreven oplossing ontwikkeling.

synergy_principle.english: Excellence emerges when these four perspectives work in harmony rather than opposition. Technical Enthusiasts provide innovation velocity while Technical Realists ensure sustainable quality. Business Enthusiasts drive practical adoption while Business Realists maintain operational stability. The most robust solutions incorporate insights from all four collaboration styles.
synergy_principle.suggested_dutch: Excellence ontstaat wanneer deze vier perspectieven in harmonie werken in plaats van tegenwerking. Technologie-pioniers bieden innovatiesnelheid terwijl Kwaliteitsbewakers duurzame kwaliteit waarborgen. Bedrijfsinnovators drijven praktische adoptie terwijl Operationele Stabilisators operationele stabiliteit handhaven. De meest robuuste oplossingen bevatten inzichten van alle vier samenwerkingsstijlen.

commitment_power.english: Public commitments transform individual intentions into collective accountability. When we declare our goals in the presence of colleagues, we create supportive pressure that drives follow-through.
commitment_power.suggested_dutch: Publieke commitments transformeren individuele intenties in collectieve verantwoordelijkheid. Wanneer we onze doelen verklaren in aanwezigheid van collega's, creëren we ondersteunende druk die follow-through drijft.

collaborative_creation.english: Collaborative creation of the group's shared excellence standards. This isn't about perfection, but about the quality of effort and mutual support we commit to maintaining.
collaborative_creation.suggested_dutch: Collaboratieve creatie van de gedeelde excellence standaarden van de groep. Dit gaat niet over perfectie, maar over de kwaliteit van inspanning en wederzijdse ondersteuning die we ons committeren te handhaven.

commitment_list.english: Approaching challenges with curiosity rather than frustration
commitment_list.suggested_dutch: Uitdagingen benaderen met nieuwsgierigheid in plaats van frustratie

commitment_list.english: Sharing discoveries and learnings openly with colleagues
commitment_list.suggested_dutch: Ontdekkingen en lessen open delen met collega's

commitment_list.english: Supporting each other through learning curves and setbacks
commitment_list.suggested_dutch: Elkaar ondersteunen door leercurves en tegenslagen heen

commitment_list.english: Building solutions that benefit the broader organization
commitment_list.suggested_dutch: Oplossingen bouwen die de bredere organisatie ten goede komen

commitment_list.english: Maintaining high standards while embracing iterative improvement
commitment_list.suggested_dutch: Hoge standaarden handhaven terwijl we iteratieve verbetering omarmen

showcase_purpose.english: Public demonstration of achievements serves multiple purposes: validates effort, spreads successful approaches, builds confidence, and creates positive momentum for continued excellence.
showcase_purpose.suggested_dutch: Publieke demonstratie van prestaties dient meerdere doelen: valideert inspanning, verspreidt succesvolle benaderingen, bouwt vertrouwen op, en creëert positief momentum voor voortdurende excellentie.

team_spotlight.english: Each team gets their moment in the spotlight!
team_spotlight.suggested_dutch: Elk team krijgt zijn moment in de schijnwerpers!

description.english: Each partnership demonstrates their solution using a structured format that maximizes learning and celebration.
description.suggested_dutch: Elk partnership demonstreert hun oplossing met een gestructureerd format dat leren en viering maximaliseert.

items.english: 60 seconds: The challenge we chose to address and why it matters
items.suggested_dutch: 60 seconden: De uitdaging die we kozen om aan te pakken en waarom het belangrijk is

items.english: 90 seconds: Live demonstration of our working solution
items.suggested_dutch: 90 seconden: Live demonstratie van onze werkende oplossing

items.english: 30 seconds: The impact this solution can have and what we learned
items.suggested_dutch: 30 seconden: De impact die deze oplossing kan hebben en wat we leerden

title.suggested_dutch: "Probeer Het Kapot te Maken" Uitdaging Ronde

protocol_description.english: After each demo, other teams get 2 minutes to test the solution with edge cases:
protocol_description.suggested_dutch: Na elke demo krijgen andere teams 2 minuten om de oplossing te testen met edge cases:

test_questions.english: What happens if I ask it in English instead of Dutch?
test_questions.suggested_dutch: Wat gebeurt er als ik het in het Engels vraag in plaats van Nederlands?

test_questions.english: Can it handle this unusual scenario?
test_questions.suggested_dutch: Kan het dit ongewone scenario aan?

test_questions.english: How does it respond to incomplete information?
test_questions.suggested_dutch: Hoe reageert het op onvolledige informatie?

goal_description.english: Goal: Not to break, but to strengthen! Each successful test = resilience points.
goal_description.suggested_dutch: Doel: Niet om kapot te maken, maar om te versterken! Elke succesvolle test = veerkracht punten.

coaching_questions.english: What's the simplest version that would add value?
coaching_questions.suggested_dutch: Wat is de eenvoudigste versie die waarde zou toevoegen?

coaching_questions.english: How can we test this assumption quickly?
coaching_questions.suggested_dutch: Hoe kunnen we deze aanname snel testen?

coaching_questions.english: What would success look like for the people who will use this?
coaching_questions.suggested_dutch: Hoe zou succes eruit zien voor de mensen die dit gaan gebruiken?

knowledge_exchange.english: This cross-pollination of expertise is what creates breakthrough solutions!
knowledge_exchange.suggested_dutch: Deze kruisbestuiving van expertise is wat doorbraak oplossingen creëert!

priority_3_enhancement.description: Nice-to-have translations for complete professional experience

philosophy.english: Workshop inspiration fades without systematic practice. The 30-day challenge transforms today's enthusiasm into sustainable habits through structured accountability and mutual support.
philosophy.suggested_dutch: Workshop inspiratie vervaagt zonder systematische praktijk. De 30-dagen uitdaging transformeert het enthousiasme van vandaag in duurzame gewoonten door gestructureerde verantwoordelijkheid en wederzijdse ondersteuning.

mission_template.english: By [specific date within 30 days], I will enhance [specific work process] by implementing [learned methodology] to achieve [measurable improvement] that benefits [specific stakeholders].
mission_template.suggested_dutch: Voor [specifieke datum binnen 30 dagen], zal ik [specifiek werkproces] verbeteren door [geleerde methodologie] te implementeren om [meetbare verbetering] te bereiken die [specifieke stakeholders] ten goede komt.

context_engineering_description.english: Context engineering is how we teach AI to think like domain experts. When we master this method, we unlock the ability to build sophisticated solutions that understand our specific challenges and opportunities.
context_engineering_description.suggested_dutch: Context engineering is hoe we AI leren denken als domein experts. Wanneer we deze methode beheersen, ontgrendelen we de mogelijkheid om geavanceerde oplossingen te bouwen die onze specifieke uitdagingen en kansen begrijpen.

ceremony_purpose.english: From Individual Learning to Collective Excellence
ceremony_purpose.suggested_dutch: Van Individueel Leren naar Collectieve Excellence

ceremony_description.english: This ceremony transforms workshop participants into committed practitioners of excellence. Together we pledge to build on what we've learned and support each other's continued growth.
ceremony_description.suggested_dutch: Deze ceremonie transformeert workshop deelnemers in toegewijde excellence beoefenaars. Samen beloven we voort te bouwen op wat we hebben geleerd en elkaars voortdurende groei te ondersteunen.

manifesto_elements.english: What we discovered today: Each person adds one capability they didn't know they had
manifesto_elements.suggested_dutch: Wat we vandaag ontdekten: Elke persoon voegt één bekwaamheid toe die ze niet wisten te hebben

manifesto_elements.english: What we're building together: Our collective vision for the organization
manifesto_elements.suggested_dutch: Wat we samen bouwen: Onze collectieve visie voor de organisatie

manifesto_elements.english: How we support each other: Specific commitments to collaboration
manifesto_elements.suggested_dutch: Hoe we elkaar ondersteunen: Specifieke commitments aan samenwerking

manifesto_elements.english: When we celebrate: Milestones and check-in moments
manifesto_elements.suggested_dutch: Wanneer we vieren: Mijlpalen en check-in momenten

blueprint_quote.english: This isn't just words on paper - it's our blueprint for excellence
blueprint_quote.suggested_dutch: Dit zijn niet alleen woorden op papier - het is onze blauwdruk voor excellence

placeholder_texts.description: Textarea placeholder texts that guide user input

items.english: Document the energy shift when participants see the transformation, note questions and excitement levels...
items.suggested_dutch: Documenteer de energieverschuiving wanneer deelnemers de transformatie zien, noteer vragen en opwindingsniveaus...

items.english: Document the collaboration styles present, partnerships formed, and opportunities for enhanced cooperation...
items.suggested_dutch: Documenteer de aanwezige samenwerkingsstijlen, gevormde partnerships, en mogelijkheden voor verbeterde samenwerking...

items.english: Record the excellence challenges chosen, partnership dynamics observed, and commitment energy levels...
items.suggested_dutch: Registreer de gekozen excellence uitdagingen, geobserveerde partnership dynamiek, en commitment energie niveaus...

items.english: Document successful solution patterns, collaboration dynamics, breakthrough moments, and scaling opportunities...
items.suggested_dutch: Documenteer succesvolle oplossing patronen, samenwerkingsdynamiek, doorbraak momenten, en schaal mogelijkheden...

items.english: Document demonstrated solutions, audience engagement, scaling opportunities identified, and momentum created...
items.suggested_dutch: Documenteer gedemonstreerde oplossingen, publiek betrokkenheid, geïdentificeerde schaal mogelijkheden, en gecreëerd momentum...

items.english: Document individual commitments made, support partnerships formed, and organizational infrastructure planned...
items.suggested_dutch: Documenteer gemaakte individuele commitments, gevormde ondersteuning partnerships, en geplande organisatorische infrastructuur...

items.english: Progress Communication: Weekly "Excellence Spotlight" in company newsletter
items.suggested_dutch: Voortgang Communicatie: Wekelijkse "Excellence Spotlight" in bedrijfsnieuwsbrief

items.english: Knowledge Repository: Shared Teams/SharePoint with all solutions and templates
items.suggested_dutch: Kennis Repository: Gedeelde Teams/SharePoint met alle oplossingen en templates

items.english: Mentorship Network: Experienced practitioners supporting newcomers
items.suggested_dutch: Mentorship Netwerk: Ervaren beoefenaars die nieuwkomers ondersteunen

items.english: Celebration Events: Monthly Excellence Lunch for all who delivered
items.suggested_dutch: Viering Evenementen: Maandelijkse Excellence Lunch voor allen die leverden

items.english: Leadership Updates: Bi-weekly progress reports to management
items.suggested_dutch: Leiderschap Updates: Tweewekelijkse voortgang rapporten aan management

engagement_questions.description: Questions for audience participation during showcases

items.english: Where else in our organization could this approach be valuable?
items.suggested_dutch: Waar anders in onze organisatie zou deze aanpak waardevol kunnen zijn?

items.english: What enhancement would make this solution even more powerful?
items.suggested_dutch: Welke verbetering zou deze oplossing nog krachtiger maken?

items.english: How might we adapt this methodology for different challenges?
items.suggested_dutch: Hoe zouden we deze methodologie kunnen aanpassen voor verschillende uitdagingen?

signing_protocol.english: Print manifesto on high-quality A1 poster
signing_protocol.suggested_dutch: Print manifest op hoogwaardig A1 poster

signing_protocol.english: Each person signs with permanent marker
signing_protocol.suggested_dutch: Elke persoon tekent met permanente marker

signing_protocol.english: Add personal excellence commitment next to signature
signing_protocol.suggested_dutch: Voeg persoonlijke excellence commitment toe naast handtekening

signing_protocol.english: Frame and hang in office as daily reminder
signing_protocol.suggested_dutch: Lijst in en hang in kantoor als dagelijkse herinnering

photo_caption.english: This photo marks Day 1 of our Excellence Era
photo_caption.suggested_dutch: Deze foto markeert Dag 1 van ons Excellence Tijdperk

excellence_future.english: You arrived as workshop participants. You leave as Excellence Practitioners. Together, we transform our organization.
excellence_future.suggested_dutch: Jullie kwamen aan als workshop deelnemers. Jullie vertrekken als Excellence Beoefenaars. Samen transformeren we onze organisatie.

items.english: // Excellence Sprint uses countdown like working version
items.suggested_dutch: // Excellence Sprint gebruikt countdown zoals werkende versie

implementation_notes.translation_complexity: Medium-High due to workshop psychology and Dutch business culture
technical_considerations: Some content uses mixed Dutch/English intentionally (AAG challenges)
Timer and JavaScript functionality must remain intact
Professional tone must match existing Dutch content
implementation_notes.recommended_approach: Systematic module-by-module translation using existing translation strategy and terminology database
